cards.title: Visibility
cards.description: See everything happening on the shop floor in real time, from work orders, machines, operators, downtimes, and performance. A live control panel for your entire operation.

cards.description: Digitize production processes. Clear instructions, error-free data entry, full traceability, and standardized operations, all executed directly by the shop floor teams.
